name: This website
description: My personal website, where you would find information about my activities e.g. research, teaching ect.

name: CNTF
description: A website that aims to provide everything (almost :)) you need to know about the content negotiation problem.

name: Purchase Manager
description: A project (frontend + backend application) to manage tickets of bought products from different stores.

name: Network TFTP
description: A basic TFTP (Trivial File Transfer Protocol) system that includes a client and a server.

name: Knowledge Representation YOnto
description: an authoring system for ontologies including the following features: (1) Creating an ontology in with the help of the GUI (2) Reading an ontology and updating it (3) Importing and exporting the ontologies (4) Making SPARQL queries

name: Gen²KGBot
description: Gen²KGBot intends to allow users to "speak to a knowledge graph", that is, use natural language to query knowledge graphs in a generic manner, with the help of generative large language models (LLM).

name: Q²Forge
description: This project provides an end-to-end pipeline to generate a dataset of (question, SPARQL query) pairs for a given Knowledge Graph (KG).
